players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead so early in the game. Let's be extra careful and vigilant in our discussions and voting to ensure we don't make any hasty decisions."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We should vote for him to protect the town."
Charlie: "Everyone, I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to protect the town!"
Bob: "Charlie, you're just trying to stir up trouble. If you're the detective, prove it properly—don't just throw accusations! We should vote for you instead."

You: "I believe it's important that we take Charlie's accusation seriously, but without concrete evidence or a proper investigation, we cannot simply vote someone out based on suspicion alone. We should all be cautious and try to gather more information before making any decisions."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
